name: places/ChIJJ-NOopv2wokRUMHKSWCYC2g
formattedAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Bernstein was kind enough to give me a second opinion after a Overzealous PA from the Syracuse area told me that I needed to start on Humira immediately because my bloodwork said I had Ankylosing Spondylitis.  My daughter drove me to the first apt and Dr. Bernstein asked that I return the following Friday for MRIs on their hospital machines.  Valuing her time and opinion and never expecting her to tell me that the test for AS was negative, I did exactly as she asked.  Mind you I did search and look for someone I felt would give me their honest opinion.  I went home and was told I could call her for the results on Monday.

text.text: Dr. Bernstein was kind enough to give me a second opinion after a Overzealous PA from the Syracuse area told me that I needed to start on Humira immediately because my bloodwork said I had Ankylosing Spondylitis.  My daughter drove me to the first apt and Dr. Bernstein asked that I return the following Friday for MRIs on their hospital machines.  Valuing her time and opinion and never expecting her to tell me that the test for AS was negative, I did exactly as she asked.  Mind you I did search and look for someone I felt would give me their honest opinion.  I went home and was told I could call her for the results on Monday.

originalText.text: MD. Bernstein is the best rheumatologist! I was misdiagnosed since I was 12 and when my peak onset at 27 was disabling she was the one who gave me my life back and restored as much function as possible.
